item.title: Added Bridgecrew
item.description: https://github.com/bridgecrewio/checkov - Infrastructure as code (IaC) security powered by the open source tool - [Checkov](https://github.com/bridgecrewio/checkov). The core Bridgecrew platform is free for up to 50 IaC resources.

item.title: Update Deta limit
